text: David Henry Gambrell (December 20, 1929 - May 6, 2021) was an American politician. Gambrell served in the United States Senate representing Georgia from 1971 through 1972.David Gambrell biography He was appointed to the Senate by President Jimmy Carter. Gambrell died on May 6, 2021 in Atlanta, Georgia at the age of 91. ==References== Category:1929 births Category:2021 deaths Category:United States senators from Georgia Category:Politicians from Atlanta Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: David H. Gambrell
